text: The Fangchengbao Bao 8 also known in english sources as the Fangchengbao Bao Leopard 8 is a luxury off-road Plug-in hybrid full-size SUV made by Fangchengbao a brand of BYD since 2024. == History and Features == The Fangchengbao Bao 8 was previewed by the concept Fangchengbao Super 8 during the launch of Fangchengbao brand in August 2023. in April 2024 it was introduced as production-ready prototype alongside the Super 3 and Super 9 concept cars. then the images of the interior where shown in June. the pre- sales in China occured in October. and was launched in November. It has a driving assistance system made by Huawei. and has a DiSus-P air suspension system the SUV has a Dual Mode Off-Road (DMO) parellel Plug-in hybrid system this system combines a 2.0 liter petrol engine with two electric motors having a combined power of 738 hp (550 kW) a BYD Blade LFP Battery with 36.8 kWh has 100 km (62 mi) of electric range and has a combined electric and fuel range of 1,200 km (746 mi). == Markets == The Fangchengbao Bao 8 is currently sold mainly in The Chinese market. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:BYD automobiles
title: Fangchengbao Bao 8
